In one single Cardano transaction, tx Metadata can store almost 16kb of data FOREVER. That costs a little bit less than 1 ADA. Bitcoin with OP_RETURN can store up to 1kb. On Ethereum you need to deploy a smart contract, and the size you can store is nowhere near.
